author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Cam Newton catfish? How 49ers WR was duped by fake texts
text:
Summary by Ground News Deebo Samuel came with receipts of text messages with Cam Newton hoping to prove the former NFL quarterback wrong when he said he never once texted the San Francisco 49ers wide receiver. Newton released a video responding to Samuel, saying he doesn't have the wideouts number. Samuel appeared to address the mishap Wednesday on X. Share menu More
